verses.verse: וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar And he said עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh Come up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron thou and Aaron נָדָ֣ב <S%H5070><s%> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> va-'a-vi-Hu, and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> miz-zik-Nei of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <S%H7812><s%> ve-hish-ta-cha-vi-Tem and worship מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok. ye afar off

וְנִגַּ֨שׁ <S%H5066><s%> ve-nig-Gash alone shall come near מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses לְבַדּוֹ֙ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Do alone אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יִגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> yig-Ga-shu; but they shall not come nigh וְהָעָ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am neither shall the people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu go up עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-To wrote מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei all the words יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Kem and rose up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven and builded מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach an altar תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat the foot הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har; under the hill וּשְׁתֵּ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten מַצֵּבָ֔ה <S%H4676><s%> matz-tze-Vah, and twelve pillars לִשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> lish-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach, And he sent אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַעֲרֵי֙ <S%H5288><s%> na-'a-Rei young men בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיַּֽעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu which offered עֹלֹ֑ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lot; burnt offerings וַֽיִּזְבְּח֞וּ <S%H2076><s%> vai-yiz-be-Chu and sacrificed זְבָחִ֧ים <S%H2077><s%> ze-va-Chim offerings שְׁלָמִ֛ים <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mim peace לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD פָּרִֽים׃ <S%H6499><s%> pa-Rim. of oxen

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi half הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam, of the blood וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and put בָּאַגָּנֹ֑ת <S%H101><s%> ba-'ag-ga-Not; [it] in basons וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and half הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam, of the blood זָרַ֖ק <S%H2236><s%> za-Rak he sprinkled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach. on the altar

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And he took סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit, of the covenant וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and read בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei in the audience הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; of the people וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and they said כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> kol All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh will we do וְנִשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> ve-nish-Ma'. and be obedient

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al Then went up מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron; and Aaron נָדָב֙ <S%H5070><s%> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <S%H30><s%> va-'a-vi-Hu, and Abihu וְשִׁבְעִ֖ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im and seventy מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> miz-zik-Nei of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- against אֲצִילֵי֙ <S%H678><s%> 'a-tzi-Lei And upon the nobles בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not שָׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach he laid יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; not his hand וַֽיֶּחֱזוּ֙ <S%H2372><s%> vai-ye-che-Zu also they saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, God וַיֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> vai-yo-che-Lu and did eat וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> vai-yish-Tu. and drink ס sa-Mek
